command.filter: filter=(threat-rule has.from.query subquery1) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery2) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery3) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery4) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery5) and ((dns-rule has.from.query subquery6) and (dns-rule has.from.query subquery7) and (dns-rule has.from.query subquery8)) and (((exception is.set) and (exempt-ip.count > 0)) or !(exception is.set)) and (cloud-inline-analysis is.best-practice) and (dns-list is.best-practice)
command.subquery1: subquery1=((action eq reset-both) and ((severity has critical) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery2: subquery2=((action eq reset-both) and ((severity has high) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery3: subquery3=((action eq reset-both) and ((severity has medium) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery4: subquery4=((action eq default) and ((severity has low) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery5: subquery5=((action eq default) and ((severity has informational) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery6: subquery6=((action eq sinkhole) and (name eq pan-dns-sec-cc))
command.subquery7: subquery7=((action eq sinkhole) and (name eq pan-dns-sec-malware))
command.subquery8: subquery8=((action eq sinkhole) and (name eq pan-dns-sec-phishing))

command.filter: filter=(threat-rule has.from.query subquery1) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery2) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery3) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery4) and (threat-rule has.from.query subquery5) and (((exception is.set) and (exempt-ip.count > 0)) or !(exception is.set)) and (cloud-inline-analysis is.best-practice)
command.subquery1: subquery1=((action eq reset-both) and ((severity has critical) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery2: subquery2=((action eq reset-both) and ((severity has high) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery3: subquery3=((action eq reset-both) and ((severity has medium) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery4: subquery4=((action eq default) and ((severity has low) and (category is.any)))
command.subquery5: subquery5=((action eq default) and ((severity has informational) and (category is.any)))

command.filter: filter=(av.action is.best-practice) and (av.wildfire-action is.best-practice) and (av.mlav-action is.best-practice) and (cloud-inline-analysis is.best-practice)

command.comment: merge all previously created html files into one Excel sheet
